snippet.title: Prologue Deep Dive with PUBG’s Brendan Greene – The PC Gaming Show Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
We’ve seen games that feature dozens, hundreds, even thousands of planets, but how about a game featuring one planet that’s the actual size of Earth? That’s the grand ambition of PUBG’s Brendan Greene, and it all starts with Prologue, coming to Steam in next year.

https://www.pcgamer.com

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#pcgamer #pcgaming #PCGSMW #prologue #pubg
